name: JohnJumper
description:
Controls:

"D" - To jump

"S"  - To Dive Mid-Air 

Jump until you die!

Credits:

Music: "Wax"- Bee Swarm Simulator

Sponge:  "Gravity Coil"- Roblox

Urchin/Starfish:  "Stab, Metal Knife in Lettuce" - Inspector J

Landing Sound: "Slime-Land"- DrMinky

Jumping Sound: "Breathing-Jumping" - Glennm
